message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder.
The inflation is hurting me, Bob, but let's be reasonable. This offer is my bottom line.
Inflation is really taking its toll on your end, I think this is a fair adjustment.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option left. Take it or leave it.
You said take it or leave it, I left it. Now the offer is less in your favor.
